choices: There was a witch that was causing trouble for everyone
1.content:
Sethryan felt the familiar expression of mud on his face.

Above him, Krogar (the same age as him, but already one of the strongest in the village) laughed along his friends. The village was full of strong males; Sethryan lucked out of the genetic gene pool, being smaller and thinner than pretty much everyone his age.

Sethryan felt a strong hand help him up. He saw Arista, a tall Amazon, as strong as she was beautiful. Along with three quarters of the men in his village (and some of the women deal), Sethryan had a huge crush on her.

"Th-thanks Aristra" he said, somewhat intimidated by her.

"No prob, Sethryan" she said as she smiled warmly, then turned to Krogar.

"You're such an ass, Krogar."

"Hey, I'm just trying to help him out. He's a man, he should be a warrior, not so pansy."

"We're warriors, Krogar. We're supposed to protect the weak, not prey on them!"

As much as he appreciated her standing up for him, Sethryan felt a 'thud' inside at her referral to him as weak.

Krogar stood, then laughed.

"All right, we'll go. It's no big deal, Sethryan, if you're in trouble just call for her to protect you."

He and his group left. Sethryan thanked Aristra then went home.

--

The next morning, Sethryan stood at the edge of the village. He wielded a sword that belonged to his father. Krogar was an ass but he was right: if he ever wanted to impress Aristra, he would need to be a warrior, an adventurer.

Now, where to start?
1.title: Quest begins

11.content:
Near the village resided a witch, who lived in a hut and claimed the surrounding area for her own. Anyone who entered had to offer her tribute, or face her wrath.

Sethryan thought this might be a much for his first mission, but hell, Aristra wasn't going to impressed if he slew some common imp. Besides, he figured he had beginner's luck.

He stood at the edge of the witches territory, and stepped onto it…

and instantly he was on a dirty, wooden floor.

"So, someone tries to come on my property without tribute."

The witch came up; she was very overweight and old, with green-tinted skin and an eyepatch. A crow perched on her shoulders.

"Well, young warrior, I-oh."

She stared at him for a moment.

"Oh, you're not Krogar. You're just some boy."

"I'm not a boy, I'm a warrior" Sethryan said in as deep and powerful a voice as he could manage.

"Hmmm, you don't look it. You're some some skinny waif. Oh, I so wish a strong man would challenge me…it's so lonely living here" she said wistfully.

Sethryan was too offended to care.

"I came here to slay you, you fat old hag."

That got her attention.

"You're a very rude boy. Perhaps this will teach you some manners."

She raised her wand and muttered some incantation.
11.title: There was a witch that was causing trouble for ...

choices: Run out before she can do anything else
Beg her to change you back
111.content:
A ball of light erupted from her wand, and flew around the room, gradually starting to circle Sethryan. He tried to dodge it, but eventually it hit his rear end.

Sethryan winced, expecting to disintegrate, or, at the very least, feel pain. But he only felt a tingly sensation.

"Ha, stupid witch, that did nothing. Prepare to die."

The witch just smiled smugly.

"Oh, give it 5 seconds."

Sethryan stopped. He felt a weird sensation behind him.

He looked behind, and gasped. His butt was…was growing.

"What the hell?!"

"You see, there's more than one way to punish someone. You want to be a man, so I decided to push you in the, well, other direction."

"What does that mean?"

But as Sethryan examined his growing rear end, he started to suspect. His butt wasn't just getting fat, it was looking like the fat ass of a woman, big and bubbly.

And it wasn't the only thing; his hips were widening, and his thighs getting thicker. .

It stopped, but that was little comfort: he now had a lower body of an overweight woman. Hell, it was bigger than Aristra's! His buttcheeks were so large his loin cloth looked like a thong!
111.title: Sethryan's butt begins to grow

1111.content:
Sethryan couldn't give up the fight now. With the witch's magic having already taken hold, he could bare to return to the village as he was. An ass as fine and shapely as his own would inspire unending ridicule from Krogar and perhaps some lustful stares from the more sexually liberal members of his village. He had to fix this, and as far as he could guess, slaying the Witch was his only option.

"So, sonny, how does it feel to have the curviest backside this side of the southern wilds?" she teased, cackling all the while.

Sethryan readied his sword.

"Time to die, you foul beast!" he shouted.

A war cry erupted from his throat as he lunged forward towards the old hag, rushing with all of his strength. Unfortunately for the lad, his body was not accustomed to the pounds of thick flesh that had been added to his rump. He quickly lost his balanced and tumbled to the floor, colliding in a flash of pain.

A howl of laughter came from the Witch, harder than before.

"You're not as swift as you used to be. Not with these," she said, unleashing a painful slap that trailed across his rump. A loud crack echoed through the room as the fat of his behind began to jiggle vibrantly.

"Now, since you seem so intent on killing me, I guess you leave me with little choice. As wimpy of a fighter as you may have been, its only fair I leave your fighting skill permanently neutered.

A second ball of light escaped from the tip of her wand. It was identical to the first, though somewhat larger in size. It traveleed at a faster pace as well, rapidly circling his prone form. Paralyzed in fear, he didn't even mount an escape as the ball collided into his upper body.

The tingly sensation overtook his entire upper body, burning from head to belly button. Like with his behind, the change happened in an millisecond. Pounds of fat coalesced in his chest as large, plump breasts came to fruition. Waves of hair forced themselves from his scalp as his locks became more delicate. Facial features melted down, softening into more feminine forms.

"Oh gosh," Sethryan mumbled, running his hands over his newly formed chest. "I-I'm a woman!"

"And a rather curvy one at that!"

"Turn me back, you must! I can't go back like this. They'll laugh at me, or worse..."

"Is this some kind of joke?" the Witch asked. "You threaten to kill me and then beg for mercy? I should have you serve as my slave, or worse! Alas, though, I feel some bit of mercy. If you want your old body back, listen to me. Return from whence you came, and bring me my tribute!"

Sethryan was immediately whisked away in a magical wind, transported back to his home village. He was just outside the gate, reclining in a pool of mud.

He needed to find tribute and fast. For that, he would need some assistance. He decided to seek out...
1111.title: Futile Fight

choices: She just shrinks you down to her size!
1112.content:
This was too weird for Sethryan, he expected death but not this! He turned and ran out for the door. Well, tried to…unuse to the shift of weight in his body, he promptly fellow over.

The witch crackled at the sight of Sethryan trying to right himself up. Once he did, he sort of quickly walked (it was difficult, he was on the brink of having to waddle) out, the witch's laugh echoing in his ears.

He kept going, deeper and deeper into the woods. Finally, he stopped, and sat down by a tree. At his new butt had padding, he sighed. What now? If he came back like this, it'd be even worse; he'd literally be the butt of everyone's jokes. But what could he do?

"Are you well, miss?"

"Who said that? and miss?"

There was a fluttering and a tiny figure appeared in front of him; she was only a few inches tall, but she resembled an adult human woman, a good looking one at that, with butterfly wings.

"You're…a wood nymph!"

She giggled. "My name is Grazia. And I thought only females of your kind had so large a butt."

Sethryan grew red.

"It's not-it was the witch."

Grazia gasped, and listened with astonishment your tale.

"You're lucky to have gotten off so easy"

"Easy? You thought I was a girl! I can't go home looking like this!"

"Hmmm"

"What?"

"I'm no where near as skilled as the witch, but I could…try to undo her curse."

Sethryan jumped up (and his butt bounced like a ballon)

"You can undo this? Please, try!"

Grazia mediated and her eyes glowed with energy as she incanted. Finally, the energies were thrown at you...
1112.title: Run out before she can do anything else

choices: "Come back to my home, perhaps the Elders can help"
"God, you whine too much. Good bye."
11122.content:
Sethryan closed his eyes, eagerly awaited the witch's changes fading away. But nothing seemed to happen, except a tingling feeling…well, he felt it when he transformed so it was natural he'd feel it changing back…

But he felt no change back there, just an odd..feeling.

He opened his eyes and was shocked. He was already half the size he used to be, and was still shrinking!

"Grazia, stop!"

"I did!"

But it was no use, Sethryan kept getting smaller and smaller. When he stopped, the forest floor resembled a jungle in themselves, with pieces of barks sticking out like large boulders.

Grazia floated down to him; they were about the same size, but she had a relative couple of feet on him.

"Grazia, help me!"
11122.title: She just shrinks you down to her size!

111222.content:
Annoyed, Grazia took off.

"Wait, no, you can't leave me like this!" Sethryan yelled, but soon she was out of sight.

Great, just great. Now not only did he have the bottom of a girl body, he was the size of a fairy! Some warrior he turned out to be…

After wallowing in his failure for a bit, Sethryan decided he needed to head, well, somewhere. However, at his current size he couldn't really recognize any location, and he didn't know where his village was. Just as well, he thought, he wasn't eager for everyone to see him now.

After a bit of journeying (which due to his thick thighs and hips was even more difficult) the sky began to grey.

Looks like rain, Sethryan thought. But it wasn't unit the rain started that he realized that at his current size, he had more to worry about than getting wet. It was a hard rain, and it felt like a bombardment.

He saw a hole. He needed some cover, so he went in.
111222.title: "God, you whine too much. Good bye."

choices: Go deep into the forest and collect ingredients
Go to some ruins and collect an idol
Go back to your village and get a book
1113.content:
Sethryan's sword clanked onto the wooden floor having dropped it in shock. He slowly moved his arms and placed his hands on his newly fatten hips reluctantly giving them a squeeze as if to affirm if they were real, to his dismay they were very real and soft to the touch. With his arms at his sides he realised how wide his bottom half had become as he noticed his arms rested at an angle, his hips now curved outwards wider then his shoulders. Moving his hands to around the back he felt that each cheek must have been bigger then his head and felt much heavier too.

His mind raced as to what the village would think of him; his lower half would now make him a bigger target for Krogar and his cronies, also even though he had always felt his chances with Aristra were slim they were much slimmer now. Since it was a warrior village he felt his rump would only hinder him in any form of combat, he would never gain their respect like this! It all became too much for him as he threw out any warrior pride he had left out the window, collapsed on to his knees; his thighs and rump wobbling as he did; and begged.

“Please, please old hag turn me back! I'm sorry for all the trouble I've caused! I'm a warrior I'm not suppose to look like this!” He pleaded, his hands clenched together.

“And why should I? You expect me to forgive a whelp like you? You bring no tribute like any respectful warrior would!”

Sethryan kept his head low to the ground as he continued to beg, his eyes welling up as he reflected more on his failings.

“Please change me back old hag! I AM a whelp, the whole village sees me as a joke. I only wished to prove myself and I couldn't even get that right! Please I'll do anything!”

The old crow was slightly taken aback by this, she knew the village nearby for it's boastful warriors and never expected one like this. She took some slight pity on him, besides his new bountiful hips the rest of his body had little muscle so it was believable he was seen as a runt of the village.

“Well you can stop calling me 'old hag'! And fine I'll turn you back BUT you must do something for me first.”

Sethryan slowly raised up from the floor, he had was ecstatic to hear this though also slightly worried at what she may ask.

“Of course, I'll keep to my word, what do you wish me to do?”

“I need you to...”
1113.title: Beg her to change you back

choices: Were the ruins of an older civilization
Was a large, faintly glowing, tree
12.content:
"The woods, maybe?" he asked himself under his breath as he took a step into the dense foliage that surrounded the village. The woods were known to be the home of many a frightening creature, and maybe if he could slay one and bring it back to the village both Krogar (That complete ass) and Aristra would be surprised.

With a deep breath, Sethryan took another step, deeper into the woods.

Now, Sethryan was not, as we know, very strong. However, what he lacked in strength he made up for in agility and quickness. He wasn't necessarily the fastest person in the village, but he was fairly speedy and possessed good endurance. As such, he jogged lightly through the woods, growing more and more weary as he approached the heart of the forest. Going wasn't really easy- there were many gnarled branches and roots to impede his pace- but he traveled quite a distance before the weight of the sword really began to bother him.

Sethryan sighed and leaned up against a tree. He was winded, having carried his father's sword no short distance as he ran.

"Nothing," he said, feeling a bit defeated, "Nothing at all."

Were the stories of the woods greatly exaggerated? He had heard of frightening beasts, cunning witches and other such devious entities in these woods, but so far he had only been able to appreciate the natural beauty of this area. Sethryan took a step back from the tree and looked ahead. Something in the distance piqued his interest. A couple hundred yards before him-
12.title: Go into the woods

121.content:
Through the trees, he could see stacked stone. This was not a natural occurrence. He walked forward, almost forgetting his father's sword in the process, and admired the ruins. He had heard of an older civilization in these woods that had died out for unknown reasons well before he was born.

"Now that's something-" he said, imagining there must be some kind of loot he could take from this place that would impress Aristra. The town, or what was left of it, was no more than 1000 yards across at its widest point, and roughly circular. In the center was a small temple of sorts. Sethryan was not a religious man, though he had always tried his best to not be a blasphemous individual so as to not offend any of the villagers. However, he felt an odd attraction to the temple.

"No harm entering, I suppose," he pondered as he stood at the door of the temple, which was at best 20 feet across and 9 feet high. Inside, light filtered in through a skylight which seemed close to forcing the whole structure to collapse. Sethryan's eyes had to adjust to the slightly darker environment before he could start to make things out. In this temple, there was only one statue, surrounded by incense that had long ago been extinguished. The statue, Sethryan found, was rather strange.

Likely a statue of some fertility goddess, it was made of gold, or at least seemed to be- but that wasn't what surprised him. The statue was of a fat woman. Large breasts, soft, doughy tummy, and finally a very wide and very prominent lower half. She was pear shaped, that was for sure. The statue was incredibly life-like, which Sethryan found rather unsettling, but a quick tap revealed that she was truly composed of some metal, likely gold. Around her thick neck, a beautiful necklace was tied, on it, a large, pink gem.

"Aristra would definitely like that," he thought, knowing that nearly any woman would find such a stone enticing. Sethryan looked around him, half forgetting that this was of course a civilization that had died out long ago. Though he was not particularly attracted to the idea of defiling someone's holy place, he reasoned that this place was truly abandoned and that Aristra would appreciate such a necklace more than any dead person could. With little effort, Sethryan managed to take the necklace from the statue.
121.title: Were the ruins of an older civilization

choices: The Goddess Takes Control Of Sethryan's Body!
1211.content:
Holding the necklace up close now, Sethryan felt truly mesmerized by its beauty. The way the light played off it was simply divine.

"No harm in trying it on, right?" he asked himself aloud, fiddling with the necklace's lock mechanism and then making it click as he placed it around his neck. The necklace felt surprisingly heavy. Sethryan could feel the weight of it on his chest. Then- much to his surprise- the amulet began to glow.

Sethryan almost bolted out of the village, amulet on his neck, but he was paralyzed with fear. Much like the amulet, the eyes of the statue of what he assumed was the fertility goddess began to glow. His head began to throb with pain- what the hell was going on? Despite his best efforts to stay on his feet, Sethryan collapsed to the ground, and blacked out.

When he came to, the sun had moved quite some distance across the sky.

"What- what happened?" he asked, rubbing his eyes.

"You took my necklace- you fool!" hollered a woman's voice.

Sethryan looked around, now wide awake.

"I- I- didn't mean to!" he shouted, searching for the source of the voice, "Where are you?"

"I'm in your head, you fool!" she shouted, "I'm the goddess Shephik!"

"G-"

"Yes, you stuttering fool, the goddess!"

"Get out of my head," he pleaded, placing his hands on his temples.

"I don't know how!" she said uselessly, "Since you put on the amulet, I'm stuck in here!"

Without a word, Sethryan reached around his neck and found that the necklace still hung there. However- the lock mechanism was gone! He'd have to rip the piece of jewelry off.

"No use!" shouted Shephik, "Tearing it off won't fix this. In fact, it'll probably only make things worse."

"So what do I do?" asked Sethryan angrily.

"Well- there must be a holy man around here- he should be able to help us!"

Sethryan nodded, the goddess seemed to have her head in the right place, even if that place happened to be right inside HIS head.

"I guess we can head back to my village-"
1211.title: He Tries It On

12113.content:
"I REFUSE-" shouted Shephik, sounding a bit strained as she did so, "To be under the control of such a weak, useless person!"

Sethryan was more than a little insulted, but what was happening to his body was of more importance at the moment. He was walking, stumbling a bit as he did so- but that wasn't what was freaking him out... he wasn't the one who was making himself walk!

"S-stop!" muttered Sethryan, almost whispering. The Goddess had possessed him, she had control of his body!

"Just stop fighting it," she said, now using Sethryan's voice, vocalizing through his mouth rather than in his head. It was as if he and the goddess had switched places, the goddess now being the controller of his body while he was merely her passenger, "I mean you no harm, peasant."

Sethryan relaxed a bit. This was almost kind of relaxing, in a way. He didn't feel so attached to his body. Sure, he could feel the mud on his feet and the wind in his hair, but he somehow felt as if a very thin film now served as a barrier between his mind and his body.

"Much better," said the Goddess, now using Sethryan's voice, "Just let me get this done, will you?"

"Sure," said Sethryan, now speaking only in his head, "Just be quick about it, will you?"

"Of course!" said Shephik, seemingly somewhat appreciative of the fact that Sethryan was being compliant.

Sethryan directed her toward his village in her head, and the made for it. The Goddess seemed a bit awkward when she moved at times, clearly being unused to Sethryan's body.

"So thin," she said, running her (Well really, Sethryan's) hands down his frame, "All bones and skin."

"Hey!"

"I'm not trying to insult you, peasant," she said in a very matter-of-fact tone, "I recognize that being thin has it's upsides."

"Oh, sorry," responded Sethryan as Shephik almost tripped on a root that was sticking out of the ground, "I'm just so used to being the small, skinny guy in my tribe. Not too much fun to be had there."

"I see," said Shephik, approaching Sethryan's hut, as he had instructed, "You know... I could probably help you with that."

"Really?" asked Sethryan in disbelief.

"Yes- but it's your choice, should we go see the holy man first or try to do something about your size?"
12113.title: The Goddess Takes Control Of Sethryan's Body!

choices: Sethryan has gained a little fat too!
Sethryan has gained A LOT of fat too!
121131.content:
Sethryan paused for a moment. What if the holy man removed Shephik from his body immediately? Then he'd be stuck as short and scrawny as he had been, and if he could somehow change that, he would go for it.

"Well?" asked Shephik impatiently, tapping Sethryan's foot on the ground.

"Maybe we should try to make me bigger before seeing the holy man," said Sethryan, "Who knows? Maybe he won't believe me, but seeing I've physically changed should be convincing."

Shephik nodded Sethryan's head.

"Good thinking, scrawny one!"

"Hey!"

"Sorry, sorry-"

Sethryan instructed Shephik to an isolated lake area where Shephik could change him without being seen. Once there, Shephik stopped and began to speak to Sethryan.

"Now, are you sure you want this?" she asked, "The changes I make will likely be permanent."

Sethryan couldn't answer quickly enough.

"Of course I want it, now let's go!"

Shephik nodded and closed her eyes. Sethryan, in turn, couldn't see outside either, as the pair now shared a single set of eyes. Shephik chanted rhythmically, swaying from left to right as she did so. Sethryan felt bigger, but he also felt funny- which he chalked up to the fact that he was growing rather quickly and wasn't even in full control of his body.

"It's working..." whispered Sethryan happily in his head.

Shephik did not respond, for a few seconds, and finally the growing sensation stopped.

"Well?" asked Sethryan.

"I'll let you regain control of your body so you can tell me if what I've done is enough," she said, opening her eyes. Already, Sethryan could see he was three or four inches taller than he had been just a few minutes earlier.

"Sweet!"

Sethryan felt himself jolting forward, as if he had been residing in the back of his own head. He felt funny, of course, but that was to be expected. He moved towards the water, feeling a strange sway in his walk. He felt quite a bit bigger... had Shephik given him muscles too?

Sethryan looked in the water, his face looking back at him. However, his face seemed swollen, pudgy and less angular-
121131.title: To Be Bigger...

choices: He was attack by a group of female bandits!
He accidentally fell into a pit of quicksand!
1211312.content:
The goddess had gone full force on his transformation. His once thin, childish torso had swelled with pounds upon pounds of fatty flesh. A thick, jiggly pot belly now hung from his midsection, its weight a constant reminder of his change. His waistline had rocketed well past fifty inches around and he had certainly bypassed the hurdle into straight up obesity. Other parts of his body had followed in suit, with his thighs and arms getting a bit of pudge as well, but none had been as filled as his stomach.

"What in the hell?" he asked aloud, dumbfounded by his change.

"The change is complete, Sethryan. You have become a fully formed man."

"Fully formed? I'm a butter ball!" he said, digging a finger into his layer of lard.

"What did you expect? I'm a goddess of female fertility, not of war. I can thicken you, not strengthen you."

"This isn't fair. No woman's gonna date a man who can barely stand, let alone serve as a true warrior."

"I wouldn't say that. Back when my worshipers still gathered at my shrine, it was considered a true honor for the village chieftain to be fattened by all of the village's bachelorettes."

"Whatever," he said, waving off her story, "Let's go find that priest and get you the hell out of me."

Sethryan left the secluded lake, his tubby form waddling away at a snail's pace. The trek, which not five minutes ago had been a simple matter, was now an adventure in itself. His muscles could barely press on with the thick blubber holding him down.

His journey continued uninterrupted until...
1211312.title: Plumping up Seth

choices: That night, Sethryan is visited by an angry priestess from the temple...
1212.content:
Sethryan tucked the necklace beneath his shirt and hurried out of the temple. He couldn't wait to give Aristra the gift, he had had a crush on her for as long as he could remember, and she was the only one in the village who ever defended him. During the day, she liked to spend her time training in the woods, wielding her sword with such amazing skill that it was like an extension of her body. Sethryan found her in the usual spot.

Dressed only in a chainmail bikini which showed off every inch of her toned body, Aristra was practicing her swordplay, striking at the air, thrusting and parrying with flawless efficiency, her long golden hair glimmering in the sun. She smiled as she noticed the skinny boy approach and walked towards him. "Come to spar with me?" She asked.

"Uh...not exactly," Sethryan blushed. He had sparred with her once, and been left with bruises and scrapes that had left him barely able to move. He wasn't the finest swordsman in the village, and Aristra was probably the best. "I got you something." He reached beneath his shirt and brought out the necklace, the large pink gem glistening in the light as he handed it to her.

"By the Gods..." Aristra gasped as she held the necklace up to the light. "Where did you find this?"

"I uh...found it on a quest," Sethryan lied, not wanting to tell her about the temple.

"A quest?" Aristra seemed surprised.

"Y-yes..." Sethryan said, trying to sound as confident as he could. "I killed a Goblin and took it from him."

Aristra looked impressed. "Ha! And they said you weren't a warrior, wait until they see this!" She was twice Sethryan's height, and she bent down to kiss him on the cheek. "Thankyou."

Sethryan blushed. He wished he hadn't lied, but she might not have accepted the gift if he had told her the truth, and maybe this would finally get him some respect. Goblins weren't exactly the finest warriors in the land, but they were widely hated by his people, and slaying one in combat would at least earn him a few pats on the back.

Aristra placed the necklace around her neck and stroke the pink gem in it's centre, smiling. "I will wear this with honour," she said.
1212.title: The Gift

13.content:
Sethryan was huffing and puffing. He had never ventured to Traslia, as he never really wanted to walk that far. (And no one really asked him to come to the larger village, which was famous for its nightlife)

That night life was noticeable now. All he wanted at a moment was a drink.

Suddenlly, a beautiful woman, dressed in a mock-harem girl costume, walked up to him carrying a purple vial.

"Thirsty? Try this."

"What is it?"

"It's the only free drink you'll get in this town."

Can't argue with economics, Sethryan figured, and he gulped the purple liquid down in one drop. It was nice, and tasted of grape.
13.title: Go the nearest neighboring village

14.content:
Ugh. Sethryan could tell why no one went to the swamp; it smells like farts. But there were supposed to be fearsome creatures here, something he could slay to get some respect.

As he put his foot down, he realized he had come upon a pothole in the swamp, and he fell down into the foul-smelling water.

Oh God, he realized, he got some in his mouth!

"You have to be careful around here" said a female voice.

Sethryan looked up to see a tall, dark-haired woman with six arms. She was pale and wore a black dress.

You grabbed one of her arms and she pulled you up.

"Thanks."

"No prob, kid. Say, you want, you can come over to my place, I'll clean you up."

On the one hand, you think you may in a situation that could end with her eating him. On the other hand, she was pretty hot.
14.title: Head to the swamp

141.content:
Sethryan entered her home (it was made out of large, incredibly strong green petals).

"I am Kumoni," she announced. "My bathing room is here"

Sethryan entered what looked to be a huge plant. Despite a nagging voice, he decided to go through and entered. What followed was bizarre; long leaf-like stems removed his clothing Istead of water or soap, he was covered with strange saps and dust (the later of which gave him hay fever).

When it was over, he emerged from the plant, but to his surprise his clothing was not returned.

"Kumoni?"

"Your clothes are out here"

After some though, Sethryan emerged. Kumoni was leaning at the wall, seizing him up.

"Hmm, you will suffice."
141.title: Go with her

choices: Kumoni assures Sethryan she'll help him through out the pregnancy
"My job in this is pretty much done now. Bye"
1412.content:
"What" Sethryan asked, feeling very self-conscious.

"I'll be frank. Not many men come here, I've got to take what I can get."

"You mean you want…to have…"

"Yes. So, you in?"

Sethryan briefly thought about the old saying about things that seem to good to be true, but he quickly dismissed it.

--

The next morning, Sethryan awoke feeling very pleasant. What happened last night was…weird, and a bit vague, but hey, he certainty felt pleasure.

And then he felt sick. He got up to find the bathroom, but realized he didn't know where that was in this crazy plant house.

"Oh dear, here" said Kumoni, who was already up.

Out of the ground formed something close to a toilet, and Sethryan barfed harder than he ever thought possible.

After a while, he began to feel better, and stopped. Kumoni walked over to you.

"That will be you in the morning for the next couple of days"

He was going to be sick..in the morning? Huh, that was funny, it was lile-

Sethryan dismissed the thought, but then he uncounsily felt his stomach, and it had grown. Not that much, but it was sticking out.

"Oh God, I-that's not possible, I can't be-"

"Oh, this isn't normal for your kind?"
1412.title: She's horny

info.brief_description: In a time of magic and barbarians, a would-be warrior finds himself in unsettling changes
info.description:
In an age gone and forgotten, young Sethryan lives in a village of warriors. However, he's always been on the small side, and is generally not respected by his peers. Tired, he decides to venture beyond his village to find adventure. However, the things he finds may change him in unsuspecting ways…

This is a transformation story, with an emphasis on weight gain, but others can be tried. Feel free to put in some fights and thrills as well.
